reviews.text: It is very well situated, along the coastline of Plett, and our room, The Carribbean, had a wonderful view of the ocean, with common sun terrace to the front.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay!

reviews.text: There is very little i can fault, in that this is a beautiful property, the room was lovely and we received a warm welcome from Judy and Glenn. The breakfast was excellent, with plenty of choice, and there is a very reasonably priced Italian only 100 yards away.
reviews.title: Really recommended

reviews.title: Great Hosts Great B & B
Fantastic place to stay
reviews.text: Spent 3 fantastic nights at Ocean Watch in April 07. Judy and Glenn were wonderful hosts and their home was truly beautiful. I would not hesitate to recommend.

reviews.title: Lovely place to stay
reviews.text: Plettenberg Bay is a lovely, stylish seaside location on the Garden Route. We stayed at a guest house called 'Ocean Watch' which had (as the name suggests) fabulous views. Very friendly, comfortable and beautifully decorated accommodation near the town centre. One excellent oriental meal at a restaurant called 'Fushi' in the town and a lunch at 'The Lookout' watching dolphins frolicking in the sea (good food but bad service).

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Plettenberg Bay is a great place from which to visit places like Knysna and Storms River Mouth and Nature Bay. These are all really worth visiting.
reviews.title: Wonderful b&b
